ai.behavior:
when ally is reactive and ! it has effect -Opportunity Awaits- use -Opportunity Awaits- on it
!when ally has effect -Vestment of Light- use -Vestment of Light- on excited it
when adjacent ally is hurt use -Holy Beam- on it
when ally is sick use -Cleanse- on it
when adjacent enemy use -Repellent Wave- on self
when ally is hurt use Move to it
when no adjacent ally use Move to it
when use Defend
